## TaskQueue class

The same as [Queue](./promizr.queue.md) but items are the tasks to execute.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default class TaskQueue<T> extends Queue<AsyncTask<T>, T> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Queue&lt;[AsyncTask](./promizr.asynctask.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;, T&gt;
